Literature.Title: Cross-Strand Interaction, Central Bending, and Sequence Pattern Act as Biomodulators of Simplified β-Hairpin Antimicrobial Amphiphiles.
Literature.Author: Shao C, Zhu Y, Jian Q, Lai Z, Tan P, Li G, Shan A

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:1% Hemolysis=256 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:10% Cell death=128 µM,Intestinal Porcine Epithelial Cells IPEC-J2:10% Cell death=>128 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=19±6.5µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(no activity data),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=27±8.3µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=21±8.3µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=24±8.8µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=37±22µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=27±8.3µM),Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC=16µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=27±8.3µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=96±35µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium C77-31(MIC=107±33µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=75±26µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(no activity data),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=64µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=64µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(no activity data),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=96±35µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=75±26µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=64µM),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(10-20% Killing=128µM)
